subject: YOU ARE A LUCKY WINNER
body:
REF: 26510460037/02/ST

Dear Winner,


  Your ticket number: 023-0148-790-459 with Serial number 5368/05 drew The lucky number: 11


 Congratulations, you have just won yourself -ONE MILLION FIVE HUNDRED THOUSAND POUNDS ONLY in the satellite software email lottery conducted By EURO MILLIONS in which e-mail addresses are picked randomly by Software powered by the Internet.


Your email address was amongst those chosen this quarter and you are to contact our Promotions' Manager for Clearance. Here is the contact information:
